subject: College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. commissioned a review of its enforcement program after finding evidence that investigators improperly obtained information with help from the booster Nevin Shapiro’s lawyer.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. commissioned a review of its enforcement program after finding evidence that investigators improperly obtained information with help from the booster Nevin Shapiro’s lawyer.
